member.summary:
To recap, in order to create a singleton class using the singleton base class, you need to do the following:
1) Define a sealed class which derives from SingletonBase[T], where T is the class name you are defining. It ensures that you cannot create subclasses from this singleton class. 2) Define a single parameterless private constructor inside the class. It ensures that no instances of this class can be created externally. 3) Access the classâ€™ singleton instance and public members by calling the Instance property.
